policyname: Users can delete chat media in their chats
with_check: '^chat-media/([0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12})/.*'::text))[1])::uuid IN ( SELECT cp.chat_id FROM chat_participants cp WHERE (cp.user_id = auth.uid())))

policyname: Users can delete their own avatar
Users can update chat media in their chats

policyname: Users can update their own avatar

column8: '^chat-media/([0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12})/.*'::text))[1])::uuid IN ( SELECT cp.chat_id FROM chat_participants cp WHERE (cp.user_id = auth.uid()))))
